name: Nuclear Bomb
description:
Enjoy a nice fun and addictive game where you destroy your opponents bombs by exploding your bomb and taking over theirs. This is a fun board game against five opponents. Each opponent is represented by a different color bomb. You can play against a human or a computer. The first player is always human, while the the remaining four players can be a combination of humans or computer.

Each cell on the board can contain up to four bombs before it explodes, once it explodes it takes over the adjacent cell and any bombs on those cells will be added to your team. You need to be the last bomb on the board to win!  The game concept might simble, winning is a whole different game all together!
